targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.namespace AS String) AS namespace,
    count(*) AS open_events
FROM audit.tracing_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND event_type = 'open'
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
GROUP BY namespace
ORDER BY open_events DESC
LIMIT 10
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.namespace AS String) AS namespace,
    count(*) AS open_events
FROM audit.tracing_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND event_type = 'open'
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
GROUP BY namespace
ORDER BY open_events DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Kubernetes namespaces that had the most open calls in the past 8 hours.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.namespace AS String) AS namespace,
    count(*) AS execve_events
FROM audit.tracing_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND event_type = 'execve'
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
GROUP BY namespace
ORDER BY execve_events DESC
LIMIT 10

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    dport AS destination_port,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'connect'
    AND dport != ''
GROUP BY pod_name, destination_port
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 20
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    dport AS destination_port,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'connect'
    AND dport != ''
GROUP BY pod_name, destination_port
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 20

panels.title: Top Destination Ports from connect Events

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    sport AS listening_port,
    count(*) AS accept_count
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'accept'
    AND sport != ''
GROUP BY pod_name, listening_port
ORDER BY accept_count DESC
LIMIT 20
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    sport AS listening_port,
    count(*) AS accept_count
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'accept'
    AND sport != ''
GROUP BY pod_name, listening_port
ORDER BY accept_count DESC
LIMIT 20

panels.title: Top Listening Ports from accept Events

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    COALESCE(
        NULLIF(daddr_ipv4, ''),
        NULLIF(daddr_ipv6, ''),
        'unknown'
    ) AS destination_ip,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'connect'
    AND (daddr_ipv4 != '' OR daddr_ipv6 != '')
GROUP BY pod_name, destination_ip
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 20
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    COALESCE(
        NULLIF(daddr_ipv4, ''),
        NULLIF(daddr_ipv6, ''),
        'unknown'
    ) AS destination_ip,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'connect'
    AND (daddr_ipv4 != '' OR daddr_ipv6 != '')
GROUP BY pod_name, destination_ip
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Top Pods by Outbound Connections (IPv4 and IPv6)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    COALESCE(
        NULLIF(saddr_ipv4, ''),
        NULLIF(saddr_ipv6, ''),
        'unknown'
    ) AS remote_ip,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'accept'
    AND (saddr_ipv4 != '' OR saddr_ipv6 != '')
GROUP BY pod_name, remote_ip
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 20
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    COALESCE(
        NULLIF(saddr_ipv4, ''),
        NULLIF(saddr_ipv6, ''),
        'unknown'
    ) AS remote_ip,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json != '{}'
    AND event_type = 'accept'
    AND (saddr_ipv4 != '' OR saddr_ipv6 != '')
GROUP BY pod_name, remote_ip
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Top Pods Accepting Connections (by Remote IP)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  container_image,
  count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 6 hour
AND event_type == 'connect'
AND container_image !=''
GROUP BY container_image
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 10
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT 
  container_image,
  count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 6 hour
AND event_type == 'connect'
AND container_image !=''
GROUP BY container_image
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 10

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY pod_name
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 10
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    CAST(container_labels_json.io.kubernetes.pod.name AS String) AS pod_name,
    count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
    wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
    AND container_labels_json IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY pod_name
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 10

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  sa_family,
  count(*) AS usage_count
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
  wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
GROUP BY sa_family
ORDER BY usage_count DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(undefined), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t, count() FROM undefined WHERE undefined >= toDateTime(0) AND undefined <= toDateTime(734) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  node_name,
  event_type,
  count(*) AS total_events
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
  wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
GROUP BY node_name, event_type
ORDER BY total_events DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  comm,
  count(*) AS total_accepts
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
  wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
  AND event_type = 'accept'
GROUP BY comm
ORDER BY total_accepts DESC
LIMIT 10

/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
  comm,

FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
  wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
  AND event_type = 'accept'
GROUP BY comm
ORDER BY total_accepts DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  node_name,
  count(*) AS events
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 1 day
GROUP BY node_name
ORDER BY events DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT 
  node_name,
  count(*) AS events
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 1 day
GROUP BY node_name
ORDER BY events DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  comm,
  event_type,
  count(*) AS total_connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE
  wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 8 hour
  AND event_type = 'connect'
GROUP BY comm, event_type
ORDER BY total_connections DESC
LIMIT 10

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT daddr_ipv4, count() 
FROM audit.network_events 
WHERE event_type = 'connect' 
GROUP BY daddr_ipv4 
ORDER BY count() DESC 
LIMIT 20

SELECT daddr_ipv4, count() 
FROM audit.network_events 
WHERE event_type = 'connect' 
GROUP BY daddr_ipv4 
ORDER BY count() DESC 
LIMIT 20

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  saddr_ipv4,
  count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE saddr_ipv4 != ''
GROUP BY saddr_ipv4
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 10
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT 
  saddr_ipv4,
  count(*) AS connections
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE saddr_ipv4 != ''
GROUP BY saddr_ipv4
ORDER BY connections DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top Source IPs (IPv4) by Connection Count

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  dport,
  count(*) AS hits
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE dport != ''
  AND wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 1 day
GROUP BY dport
ORDER BY hits DESC
LIMIT 10
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT 
  dport,
  count(*) AS hits
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE dport != ''
  AND wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 1 day
GROUP BY dport
ORDER BY hits DESC
LIMIT 10

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  event_type,
  comm,
  filename,
  count() AS total_events
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY
  event_type,
  comm,
  filename
ORDER BY
  total_events DESC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
  event_type,
  comm,
  filename,
  count() AS total_events
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY
  event_type,
  comm,
  filename
ORDER BY
  total_events DESC
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  cgroup_id,
  cgroup_name,
  comm,
  count() AS total_events
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY ROLLUP(comm, cgroup_id, cgroup_name)
ORDER BY
  total_events DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
  cgroup_id,
  cgroup_name,
  comm,
  count() AS total_events
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY ROLLUP(comm, cgroup_id, cgroup_name)
ORDER BY
  total_events DESC

panels.title: ROLLUP number of comm by cgroup

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toStartOfDay(wall_time_dt) AS day,
    COUNT(*) AS syscall_count
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    toStartOfDay(wall_time_dt) AS day,
    COUNT(*) AS syscall_count
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  node_name,
  event_type,
  count() AS total_syscalls
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY
  node_name,
  event_type
ORDER BY
  node_name,
  total_syscalls DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
  node_name,
  event_type,
  count() AS total_syscalls
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY
  node_name,
  event_type
ORDER BY
  node_name,
  total_syscalls DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    node_name,
    event_type,
    argMax(comm, latency_ms) AS comm_with_max_latency,
    argMax(filename, latency_ms) AS filename_with_max_latency,
    argMax(cgroup_name, latency_ms) AS cgroup_name_with_max_latency,
    MAX(latency_ms) AS max_latency_ms
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY node_name, event_type
ORDER BY max_latency_ms DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
    node_name,
    event_type,
    argMax(comm, latency_ms) AS comm_with_max_latency,
    argMax(filename, latency_ms) AS filename_with_max_latency,
    argMax(cgroup_name, latency_ms) AS cgroup_name_with_max_latency,
    MAX(latency_ms) AS max_latency_ms
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY node_name, event_type
ORDER BY max_latency_ms DESC

panels.title: Max latency per node and event type

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  comm,
  event_type,
  cgroup_name,
  avg(latency_ms) AS avg_latency_ms
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY
  event_type,
  cgroup_name,
  comm
ORDER BY
  avg_latency_ms DESC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT
  comm,
  event_type,
  cgroup_name,
  avg(latency_ms) AS avg_latency_ms
FROM audit.tracing_events
GROUP BY
  event_type,
  cgroup_name,
  comm
ORDER BY
  avg_latency_ms DESC
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  comm,
  count(*) AS activity
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 12 hour
GROUP BY comm
ORDER BY activity DESC
LIMIT 10
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=clickhouse Copy, user=1 */
SELECT 
  comm,
  count(*) AS activity
FROM audit.network_events
WHERE wall_time_dt > now() - INTERVAL 12 hour
GROUP BY comm
ORDER BY activity DESC
LIMIT 10
